subject: Years may pass in looking for a job, we offer it right now [Fri, 13 Apr 2007 20:25:11 -0800]
body: It was a slap.    clinging career       "Sair!Eddie Desmond had lived in New York City all his life, but he had been to the Bronx Zoo, and Christ, there were picture-books weren't there?    ""Well.   She poured Betadine on the blade.     "She pulled back both hammers.       "he asked.   I knew writers were supposed to have big egos, but I guess I didn't understand that meant ingratitude, too!       Roll out those lazy hazy crazy days of summer, he though sourly, and threw the key-hammer in the general direction of the wastebasket.    applicant
